page.title: 12COMMUNICATIONS
page.content:
THE POST OFFICE IN LIDLINGTON AND BROGBOROUGH ARE THE MAINSTAY OF COMMUNICATIONS IN THE AREA, OFFERING ALL THE SERVICES OF A MAIN POST OFFICE WITH THE EXCEPTION OF CAR TAX ETC. A PUBLIC TELEPHONE BOX IS AVAILABLE IN BOTH VILLAGES AND MOST HOUSES HAVE PRIVATE PHONES.
THERE ARE FIVE POST BOXES IN THE AREA, COLLECTIONS BEING TWICE DAILY MONDAY TO FRIDAY AND ONCE ON SATURDAY. A NOTICE BOARD INSIDE THE POST OFFICE ADVERTISES LOCAL SERVICES AND ITEMS FOR SALE,FREE OF CHARGE.ALL SHOPS DISPLAY POSTERS ADVERTISING LOCAL EVENTS,BUS AND TRAIN TIMETABLES ARE DISPLAYED ON NOTICE BOARDS.THE PARISH COUNCIL HAS ITS OWN NOTICE BOARD OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE HALL FOR COUNCIL NOTICES.
